resources.string:
Welcome to Montgomery Energy Connection, an app to help you track your energy-saving habits! On the next page, you will be able to select tasks to concentrate on, such as reducing your shower time. You may edit this list of tasks at any time.


Every day, we challenge you to complete as many of your selected tasks as possible in order to gain points. You can redeem these points to earn prizes.


Hit "NEXT" to continue to select your tasks.
